faqData.question: Can guests take photos during the ceremony?
faqData.answer: Yes, guests may take photos during the ceremony. We ask that these moments are not shared on social media. A QR code will be provided for uploading your photos. Thank you for your understanding.

faqData.question: What is the wedding dress code?
faqData.answer: Our wedding follows a strict formal dress code. No slippers, shorts, jeans, tshirt, or white color. Colors allowed: Brown, black, teal green, blue, gray, or beige only. We kindly ask all guests to adhere to the dress code.

faqData.question: Are children allowed at the wedding?
faqData.answer: While we love children, we are only able to accommodate those who are part of the entourage. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
